page.title: 15HILLSTOWN FAIR.
page.content: A fair comes to Hillstown every year, usually in late June or early July. It arrives on Tuesday and opens on Thursday evening of the same week. It is also open on Friday,Saturday, Monday ans sometimes Tuesday evenings and Saturday afternoon. The fair consists of four main rides- a Waltzer, Dodgem Cars, Cyclone and Motocross (usually called Speedway). The average price is about 30p per person. In addition to the main rides there are several rides for the small children and quite a few stalls where you can win coconuts, goldfish and other small prizes. To complete the fair there are two or three amusement arcades that house the usual space invader-type computer games. The fair has usually packed up and gone the day after it last opens.
